description: Defines which context files each agent needs to load

developer.description: Developer needs full context for implementation

reviewer.description: Consolidated reviewer loads only context files needed for assigned dimensions (qa/security/pm)

qa-reviewer.description: QA review. Prefer consolidated reviewer agent for most tasks.

security-ops.description: Security review. Prefer consolidated reviewer agent for most tasks.

project-manager.description: Requirements review. Prefer consolidated reviewer agent for most tasks.

task-manager.description: Task manager only needs task database access (on-demand only)

researcher.description: Researcher needs project context for technical research

project-overview.md.purpose: High-level project summary, tech stack, key requirements

design-system.md.purpose: Design tokens, component patterns, styling conventions

requirements-summary.md.purpose: Acceptance criteria, code standards, security, testing requirements

optimization_notes.context_loading: Agents should read only required context files from .claude/context/
optimization_notes.full_spec_access: Agents should ONLY read full spec documents if specific detail is needed
